name: Blood donation
description:
Controls: Click on their left arm (our right).

Goal: Make every one at least neutral.

---

You are in a blood donation center and different people  come. They have 3  moods : Happy, Neutral and Sad. Your goal is to make everyone at least in a neutral mood. To manage this you have to take blood from happy people and give it to a sad person. But don't take too much blood !!!

---

If you're able to, please contact your local blood donation center and help save lives ♥

Development :
  • Language is haxe,  engine is heaps
  • Developped in  8h (code)  and 4h (illustrations)
  • We changed at the middle of the project the Game Design (and i reuploaded the game 15 min after the deadline because some sounds were missing)
  • Who worked on the game : Grimo (code), Saveria Argentin(art)
  • All art & game code was made during the jam, but the code uses a base (more on the github)
  • Source code: https://github.com/Grimo0/trijam126
